1.name: Nomad's Joy
1.description: Treat yourself to the authentic "Plov" of nomads prepared with firewood in a cast iron "Kazan" with quality rice, carrots and lamb melting in your mouth

2.name: Chick-n-Grains
2.description: This amazing Chicken Plov is prepared with firewood according to authentic traditions in a cast iron "Kazan" with quality rice, carrots and tender boneless chicken meat

3.name: Tomato barberry salad
3.description: Tomato barberry and red onion salad.
